Title: Jio Financial buys out SBI's stake in payments bank JV
Description: Jio Financial Services will acquire full ownership of Jio Payments Bank after SBI's divestment of its 17.8% stake. With the deal valued at ₹104.54 crore, the transaction awaits the Reserve Bank of India's approval and is expected to conclude within 45 days.

Title: Nifty weekly, monthly expiry days to change to Monday from April 4
Description: NSE has changed F&O expiry days for Nifty, Bank Nifty, FinNifty, Nifty Next50 and Nifty Midcap Select to Monday from the current Thursday expiry day. In a circular issued today, NSE made the changes and it will come into effect from April 4, 2025.

Title: Target shares up 4% after it posts strong Q4 profits & sales, but warns on impact of tariffs
Description: Sales and profits slipped for Target during the crucial holiday quarter as customers held back on spending and the company said there will be "meaningful pressure" on its profits to start the year because of tariffs and other costs.

Title: Tata Capital eyes $11 billion valuation for India IPO
Description: Tata Group plans to list Tata Capital, targeting an $11 billion valuation in India’s biggest IPO of 2024. The offering could raise $2 billion amid a booming IPO market despite recent stock declines.

Title: Sebi permits all NBFCs, HFCs to invest in security receipts by Asset Reconstruction Cos
Description: Markets regulator Sebi has allowed all non-banking financial companies (NBFC), including housing finance companies, to invest in security receipts issued by Asset Reconstruction Companies (ARCs), a move aimed at encouraging investments in the bad loans space.
